verbs.description: Trump now [V: is] zeroing in on -- and at times embellishing -- reports that a government informant approached members of his 2016 campaign during the presidential election in a possible bid to glean intelligence on Russian efforts to sway the election .

[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: now] is [V: zeroing] in [ARG1: on] -- and at times embellishing -- [ARG1: reports that a government informant approached members of his 2016 campaign during the presidential election in a possible bid to glean intelligence on Russian efforts to sway the election] .

[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: now] is zeroing in on -- and [ARGM-TMP: at times] [V: embellishing] -- [ARG1: reports that a government informant approached members of his 2016 campaign during the presidential election in a possible bid to glean intelligence on Russian efforts to sway the election] .

Trump now is zeroing in on -- and at times embellishing -- [V: reports] [ARG1: that a government informant approached members of his 2016 campaign during the presidential election in a possible bid to glean intelligence on Russian efforts to sway the election] .

Trump now is zeroing in on -- and at times embellishing -- reports that [ARG0: a government informant] [V: approached] [ARG1: members of his 2016 campaign] [ARGM-TMP: during the presidential election] [ARGM-PRP: in a possible bid to glean intelligence on Russian efforts to sway the election] .
